# Changelog

# v1.6.0 (24/11/2017)

No changelog for this release.

# v2.0.4 (24/11/2017)

  • [closed] Switch to mime-score module for resolving extension contention issues. #182 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Update mime-db to 1.31.0 in v1.x branch #181 (opens new window)

# v1.5.0 (22/11/2017)

  • [closed] need ES5 version ready in npm package #179 (opens new window)
  • [closed] mime-db no trace of iWork - pages / numbers / etc. #178 (opens new window)
  • [closed] How it works in brownser ? #176 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Missing ./Mime #175 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Vulnerable Regular Expression #167 (opens new window)

# v2.0.3 (25/09/2017)

No changelog for this release.

# v1.4.1 (25/09/2017)

  • [closed] Issue when bundling with webpack #172 (opens new window)

# v2.0.2 (15/09/2017)

  • [V2] fs.readFileSync is not a function #165 (opens new window)
  • [closed] The extension for video/quicktime should map to .mov, not .qt #164 (opens new window)
  • [V2] [v2 Feedback request] Mime class API #163 (opens new window)
  • [V2] [v2 Feedback request] Resolving conflicts over extensions #162 (opens new window)
  • [V2] Allow callers to load module with official, full, or no defined types. #161 (opens new window)
  • [V2] Use "facets" to resolve extension conflicts #160 (opens new window)
  • [V2] Remove fs and path dependencies #152 (opens new window)
  • [V2] Default content-type should not be application/octet-stream #139 (opens new window)
  • [V2] reset mime-types #124 (opens new window)
  • [V2] Extensionless paths should return null or false #113 (opens new window)

# v2.0.1 (14/09/2017)

  • [closed] Changelog for v2.0 does not mention breaking changes #171 (opens new window)
  • [closed] MIME breaking with 'class' declaration as it is without 'use strict mode' #170 (opens new window)

# v2.0.0 (12/09/2017)

  • [closed] woff and woff2 #168 (opens new window)

# v1.4.0 (28/08/2017)

  • [closed] application/vnd.adobe.photoshop #147 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Directories should appear as something other than application/octet-stream #135 (opens new window)
  • [closed] requested features #131 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Make types.json loading optional? #129 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Cannot find module './types.json' #120 (opens new window)
  • [V2] .wav files show up as "audio/x-wav" instead of "audio/x-wave" #118 (opens new window)
  • [closed] Don't be a pain in the ass for node community #108 (opens new window)
  • [closed] don't make default_type global #78 (opens new window)
  • [closed] mime.extension() fails if the content-type is parameterized #74 (opens new window)
